nodes.text: The Lake of the Unseen was a lake located in the northeastern corner of the Nightmare Lands on the planet Voss, east of the Darkstone Grove. Favored by native vorantiki, the Lake was home to at least three enormous vorantiki—Qusak, Sorak, and Drumond—during the Galactic War. Despite the wildlife and corruption from the Dark Heart, a group of Voss Mystics could be found meditating at a damaged shrine in the lake, by which they were able to reach the Spirit World.
The Lake of the Unseen appears as an area on Voss in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
